customInstructions:
This is a Symfony 7.3 DDD blog application running in Docker containers.

CRITICAL RULES:
1. ALWAYS use 'docker exec blog-php' for ALL PHP commands
2. Application runs on port 8081 (not 8080)
3. Follow DDD architecture patterns strictly
4. Use XML Doctrine mappings (not annotations)
5. No database migrations - use schema:create

AVAILABLE SLASH COMMANDS:
- /jira-to-pr {TASK-KEY} - Complete Jira task and create PR
- /write-to-confluence {URL} {endpoint} - Write docs to Confluence
- /update-confluence {URL} - Update existing Confluence docs
- /figma-to-code {FIGMA-URL} - Convert Figma design to code
- /add-localization {feature} - Add i18n support
- /create-tech-doc {endpoint} - Create API documentation
- /update-tech-doc {endpoint} - Update API documentation
